thread.section_title: Point A Hotel, London Paddington - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful Visit
thread.title_full: Wonderful Visit - Review of Point A Hotel, London Paddington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Carl S
title: Wonderful Visit
text:
My fianc√©e and I stayed here on our first visit to London and I have to say it was fantastic! Valeria was by far the most incredible host we have has, always greeting us with a smile as we walked in. This visit I proposed to my long term girlfriend and the hotel's kind hospitality made the whole experience incredibly pleasant.
We found the location ideal, being a short distance from edge ware road tube station and within walking distance of marble arch and oxford street.
Cafe 8 next door was great for breakfast as well with the discount offered. Good quality food.
The rooms themselves are what you pay for and while on the smaller side, for a short term stay you couldn't ask for anything more.
Loved it, loved it staff in particular! Thank you very much.
